project.description: for each children 1. it's downloading the size report of the latest tag and the size report of one tag before the latest one. 2. compare the two reports and check the size differences between them.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
change=`echo $GERRIT_REFSPEC | cut -d/ -f4` ps=`echo $GERRIT_REFSPEC | cut -d/ -f5` artifactory_host=artifactory failedAtLeastOnce="False" artifactory_url=https://$artifactory_host/ipp-release/com/ac/ipp/SFB failedToCurlOnceAtLeast="False" User="$artifactory_user:$artifactory_password" NEWLINE=$'\n' TARGET=`echo $GERRIT_REFSPEC | sed 's:refs/changes/../::; s:/:-:g'` #OLDTAG=$(git describe | cut -d'-' -f1) OLDTAG=$(git describe --abbrev=0 --tags) echo $OLDTAG_TEST passAtLeastOnce="False" localCurlFailed="False" localCurlCount=2 #get OLD TAG BRANCH (could been rebase from another branch) git fetch || echo "git fetch has failed, not failing the build" OLDTAG_BRANCH=$(git branch --no-color -r --contains ${OLDTAG} | grep -v -e '->' | head -1 | cut -d'/' -f2-) echo "branch is:$OLDTAG_BRANCH"
if [[ -z ${OLDTAG_BRANCH} ]] then OLDTAG_BRANCH=$GERRIT_BRANCH fi
if [[ "$NAGINATOR_COUNT" == "" ]] then NAGINATOR_COUNT=0 fi OLDTAG_BRANCH=$GERRIT_BRANCH # temporary solution for feature/SingleImage branch if [[ "$GERRIT_BRANCH" == "feature/SingleImage" ]] then OLDTAG_BRANCH=master fi if [[ "$GERRIT_BRANCH" == "3.4.0" ]] then OLDTAG_BRANCH="4.0.0" fi
# get one tag before ${NEWTAG} to compare two newest size_report csv echo "In branch ${GERRIT_BRANCH} between tags ${OLDTAG} and ${NEWTAG} the img size is different in the following models:" > emailContent.txt echo -e "\r\n" >> emailContent.txt #get all childs names from the spesific TAG childs=$(cat boards2review.yml | sed s/.*AUTOPRD=// | cut -d" " -f1 | cut -d"&" -f1) allChilds=($childs) allChildsLength=${#allChilds[@]} for i in `seq 2 $(($allChildsLength-1))` do echo "*****************************************************${allChilds[i]}********************************************************************" #get the New Tag curl -k -u ${User} --insecure -fO https://artifactory/ipp-review/SFB/${GERRIT_BRANCH}/${TARGET}/${allChilds[i]}_size_report.csv || localCurlFailed="True" #get the OLDER CSV REPORT (NEWTAG -1) curl -k -u ${User} --insecure -fO "${artifactory_url}/${OLDTAG_BRANCH}/${OLDTAG}/${allChilds[i]}/${OLDTAG}_size_report.csv" || curlHasFailed="True" # if curl failed to download the report (not running the comparison) if [[ "$localCurlFailed" == "True" ]] then echo "Build Folder Doesnt Exists, doesn't have size_report" ((localCurlCount+=1)) localCurlFailed="False" else
if [[ "$curlHasFailed" == "True" ]] then failedToCurlOnceAtLeast="True" echo "Failed to download sizeReport from Artifactory to ${allChilds[i]}" >> size_report_${allChilds[i]}.txt curlHasFailed="False" else
# run comparison between the old csv to the new csv set +e sh scripts/mtds_size.sh size_diff ${OLDTAG}_size_report.csv ${allChilds[i]}_size_report.csv RetunedValue=$? set -e #return 0 if the script succeseded else if failed if [[ $RetunedValue == "0" ]] then passAtLeastOnce="True" echo "${allChilds[i]} img size test passed" elif [[ $RetunedValue == "1" ]] then failedAtLeastOnce="True" echo "${allChilds[i]} img size test failed" echo "${allChilds[i]} img size test failed, You can see full report here ${BUILD_URL}artifact/size_report_${allChilds[i]}.txt" >> emailContent.txt echo -e "\r\n" >> emailContent.txt message="size_diff Test has failed on model ${allChilds[i]}. You can see the output here: ${BUILD_URL}artifact/size_report_${allChilds[i]}.txt${NEWLINE}Please make sure this increased size can not be avoided.${NEWLINE}To approve this change please contact Arik Kabessa." if [[ ${allChilds[i]} == "445HD_IGS" ]] then sed -i "s/'//g" build/size_diff_report_445HD.txt report_output=$(echo "$(cat build/size_diff_report_445HD.txt)") else sed -i "s/'//g" build/size_diff_report_${allChilds[i]}.txt report_output=$(echo "$(cat build/size_diff_report_${allChilds[i]}.txt)") fi
message_with_report="size_diff test has failed on model ${allChilds[i]}. Please make sure this increased size can not be avoided.${NEWLINE}To approve this change please contact Arik Kabessa.${NEWLINE} You can see the output here:${report_output}" ssh -p 29418 jenkins@gerrit gerrit review --notify NONE --message "'${message_with_report}'" ${GIT_COMMIT} else needToSendEmail_reduced_size="True" echo "${allChilds[i]} full report: ${BUILD_URL}artifact/size_report_${allChilds[i]}.txt" >> emailContent_reduced_size.txt fi if [[ -e build/size_diff_report_${allChilds[i]}.txt ]] then mv build/size_diff_report_${allChilds[i]}.txt size_report_${allChilds[i]}.txt fi fi fi done
echo "failedAtLeastOnce=$failedAtLeastOnce" > properties echo "OLDTAG=$OLDTAG" >> properties echo "change=$change" >> properties # If both conditions are true so i am failing the build because all moudules are failed to download size_report from artifactory if [[ "$failedToCurlOnceAtLeast" == "True" ]] then echo "*************Not found in artifactory ${OLDTAG}******************" if [[ "$NAGINATOR_COUNT" == "$NAGINATOR_MAXCOUNT" ]] then #put me and jontan reviewrs message="Size check report of the tag you are based on cannot be download, adding Ben/Jonatan to review" #ssh -p 29418 jenkins@gerrit gerrit review --notify NONE --message "'${message}'" $change,$ps ssh -p 29418 jenkins@gerrit gerrit review --notify NONE --message "'${message}'" --label Size=-1 ${GIT_COMMIT} ssh -p 29418 jenkins@gerrit "gerrit set-reviewers -a ben.magriso@audiocodes.com -a jonatan.reberger@audiocodes.com ${GIT_COMMIT}" else message="Size check report of the tag you are based on cannot be download, retry again in 15 minutes" echo $message if [[ "$NAGINATOR_COUNT" == "1" ]] then ssh -p 29418 jenkins@gerrit gerrit review --notify NONE --message "'${message}'" $change,$ps fi exit 1 fi exit 0 fi if [[ ${allChildsLength} == ${localCurlCount} ]] then echo "dont compiled any Model...keep same score" exit 0 fi
#if at least one Models Are Failed put size-1 if [[ "$failedAtLeastOnce" == "True" ]] then echo "size=-1" ssh -p 29418 jenkins@gerrit gerrit review --notify NONE --label Size=-1 ${GIT_COMMIT} else #all True put size +1 echo "Size=+1" ssh -p 29418 jenkins@gerrit gerrit review --notify NONE --label Size=+1 ${GIT_COMMIT} fi

com.chikli.hudson.plugin.naginator.Nagin.regexpForRerun: .*(ClosedChannel|no workspace from node|Workspace is not accessible|node is offline|Error fetching remote|JNLP4-connect connection|Error cloning remote repo 'origin').*
